Pre-Game Insights: Martinique need to revive their campaign as soon as possible, as another setback in a row will likely hurt their chances in the group.
Guyana will do their best to avoid a fresh defeat and could be eying a draw if they are unable to snatch a win over the hosts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Martinique have won four times and lost once in their last five matches at home.
Martinique have scored four goals and conceded four in their last five matches in all competitions.
Martinique have played 12 matches in this competition, winning twice, drawing five times and losing five times while Guyana have played 17 (W11, D2, L4).
Guyana have won once and lost four times in their last five matches on the road.
Martinique vs Guyana Prediction: Martinique 3-1 Guyana
Tip 2: Game to have over 2.5 goals – Yes
Tip 3: Martinique to score first – Yes
Others: Martinique will play host to Guyana at Stade Municipal Pierre-Aliker in the CONCACAF Nations League on Monday.
Both teams are set to face off against each other for the first time.
Martinique will compete in the top division once again this season.
They are yet to play in a lower division since they entered the competition in 2019-20.
Les Matinino opened their campaign in Group A with a 3-1 defeat to Guatemala in an away fixture, which leaves the hosts fourth with no points.
Trending: Guyana earned promotion to League A for the first time in the previous edition following a flawless campaign that saw them winning all five matches.
Golden Jaguars lost their Group A opening game at home 3-1 against Suriname.
Martinique have won twice, drawn twice and lost once in their last five matches while Guyana have won once and lost four times.
